ygData.subject: Re: Two of the same weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s not the official term?  Hurrah!  I thought it was stupid too, but many bards seemed to recognize it better than stacking or weaving or juggling.  I
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 8 Jul 1999, J.M. Capozzi wrote:
>
> Also, this is off-topic to this thread, but in response to someone who felt
> 'twisting' (BTW, 10 free brownie points if you can point me to the person
> that coined that term...and an evil and painful death for him..I really
> dislike it) was an exploit.

It's not the official term? Hurrah! I thought it was stupid
too, but many bards seemed to recognize it better than
stacking or weaving or juggling. I will stop using "twisting"
(except out of habit :-).

--
John H. Kim
